name: Fairy Treasure
summary: Can you capture pieces of the magic moving scroll to unlock stunning treasures? Embark on a quest to recapture the Fairy Treasure, stolen from the Kingdom of Trollandia by an evil, greedy troll. Travel along the Fairy River, where you'll confront hags, goblins, and other evil adversaries. Gather up magic scroll parts to uncover the whereabouts of the hidden treasures and solve puzzles to unlock secret areas. Collect keys to unleash the mighty chain ball inside this captivating, brick-busting game. May the fairies be with you as your quest for the Fairy Treasure begins!
